newsitem.title: GERMANY: Bilfinger won 150 mln dmk in new orders.
newsitem.headline: Bilfinger won 150 mln dmk in new orders.

text.p: German construction company Bilfinger + Berger AG said on Monday it had in November won orders in Australia worth a total of 150 million marks.

The group said its Australian unit Baulderstone Hornibrook had won orders to build a 33-floor hotel in Brisbane, a 21-floor apartment complex in Melbourne and a residential building in Sydney as well as pavilions for the Sydney Olympic Games in 2000.
Baulderstone Hornibrook is starting 1997 with orders worth more than 1.5 billion marks, up from 600 million a year ago, Bilfinger said.
